DOC.detailed_description: Injection drug user constitute second large subset U.S. population risk HIV infection AIDS-associated mortality . Narcotic addiction often treat use methadone . Fluconazole show highly effective treat symptomatic mucosal candidiasis , unknown whether fluconazole affect methadone metabolism , could result symptom methadone withdrawal overdose patient take drug combination . DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Concurrent Medication : Allowed : Antiretroviral therapy . Intermittent acetaminophen , aspirin , ibuprofen . Patients must : CD4 count > = 250 cells/mm3 within 3 month prior study entry . Received stable dose methadone minimum 30 day prior study entry . Negative urine toxicology screen ( except methadone methadone metabolite ) within 14 day prior study entry . Reasonably good health . Life expectancy least 6 month . Ability willingness comply protocol requirement . NOTE : Patients recruit methadone maintenance treatment program currently administer Addiction Research Treatment Corporation . Enrollment woman encourage . NOTE : Patients currently enrol CPCRA treatment prophylaxis trial eligible study provide permanently remove study drug protocol . Prior Medication : Required : Stable dose methadone minimum 30 day prior study entry . Allowed : Prior antiretroviral therapy ( dose stable 14 day prior study entry ) . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : Known sensitivity azoles , methadone , opiate narcotic . Concurrent Medication : Excluded : Amiodarone .
